law.catch_line: Notwithstanding § 5-101 of this subtitle, in determining the financial condition of an insurer, the...

text.section:
Notwithstanding subsection (a) of this section, a bona fide mortgage loan to an officer or employee of the insurer may be allowed as an admitted asset if the loan:
is approved and ratified by the board of directors of the insurer;
is secured by a first mortgage on a principal residence of an officer or employee; and
does not exceed the amount allowed for any other mortgage investment under § 5-511(g) of this title.
